snippet: Prosecutors said the driver was high on PCP and methamphetamine when he lost control of his car in the East Village in 2013, hitting three deli workers and killing one.
abstract: Shaun Martin of Queens, driver who crashed car into grocery in East Village in 2013, is charged with murder; prosecutors say he was high on PCP and methamphetamine when he hit three deli workers, killing one.
lead_paragraph: Prosecutors said the driver was high on PCP and methamphetamine when he lost control of his car in the East Village in 2013, hitting three deli workers and killing one.

headline.main: Murder Charge for Driver in Drug-Related Crash at a Manhattan Deli
headline.print_headline: Driver Charged With Murder in Drug-Related Crash at Deli
